_meta.source: Researched from Papeete tourism, cruise guides, and local sources

bbox_hint.note: Covers terminal, Le Marché, waterfront, Point Venus

transit_routes.name: Walk to Le Marché
transit_routes.note: New terminal downtown. Market is adjacent.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Point Venus
transit_routes.note: Captain Cook landing site. Black sand beach.

featured_experiences.name: Le Marché Market
featured_experiences.note: Best market in French Polynesia. Go early for atmosphere.

featured_experiences.name: Roulottes (Food Trucks)
featured_experiences.note: Place Vaiete waterfront. Opens at dusk.

featured_experiences.name: Island Circle Tour
featured_experiences.note: 114 km around Tahiti Nui. Dramatic coastal scenery.
